<template>
<n-form>
    <n-form-item label="name">
        <n-h5>品牌的名字</n-h5>
        <n-input clearable v-model:checked="productInfo.brandName" label="brandName"/>
    </n-form-item>

     <n-form-item v-model:value='productInfo.brandValues' label="brandValues">
         <n-h5>品牌理念</n-h5>
         <n-input type="textarea"/>
     </n-form-item>
    
    <n-form-item label="name">
        <n-h5>产品或服务的名字</n-h5>
        <n-input clearable v-model:checked="productInfo.name" label="name"/>
    </n-form-item>

     <n-form-item v-model:value='productInfo.usp' label="usp">
         <n-h5>独特卖点</n-h5>
         <n-input type="textarea"/>
     </n-form-item>

         <n-button type="primary" @click="ceateProduct">提交</n-button>
     </n-form>
</template>

<script setup>
import {ref} from 'vue';
import {  NButton, NForm, NInput, NH5} from 'naive-ui';
const productInfo = ref({
    brandName : '',
    brandValues:'',
    name : '',
    usp : '',
    })
const createProduct = () =>{
      console.log(productInfo.value);
      try{
          /*
          const resp =  await axios.get('http://localhost:8005/account/auth/',{
            headers: {
                'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}` // 设置请求头
                }});
         */ }catch (error) {
        console.error('Failed to fetch user info:', error);
        }
      }

</script>
<script>
  export default{
      name:'CreateProductForm'
      };
</script>
